channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: BYD posts slowest annual sales growth in 5 years, but China’s EV giant is still set to outsell Tesla for the first time
item.description: BYD sold 4.6 million vehicles last year, compared to 4.3 million in 2024. Monthly sales for December dropped by 18.3% year-on-year.

item.title: Easily See Two Stars That Flew Past The Sun — And Made Earth Habitable
item.description: Fact-based stories from our cosmic neighbourhood, one star or constellation at a time. Name it, navigate it, know it.

item.title: Behind glam luxury brands Michael Kors and Jimmy Choo lurks a troubled holding company losing millions
item.description: Capri CEO John Idol’s fashion powerhouse of Michael Kors, Versace and Jimmy Choo was supposed to rival LVMH. Seven years in, the company lost $1 billi...

item.title: Quran used to swear in New York City’s mayor for the first time in history as Zohran Mamdani takes office
item.description: It dates back to the late 18th or early 19th century and belongs to the New York Public Library’s Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture.

item.title: Could 2026 be the year of the 4-day workweek? Here’s what top business leaders have predicted about the shift
item.description: Business titans from Elon Musk to Bill Gates made bold predictions that the workweek will soon be reduced to four days—or shorter.

item.title: How AI Agents Will Take Over Your Shopping, Schedule And Travel
item.description: AI agents are moving beyond the workplace and into everyday life, with the potential to manage shopping, schedules, and travel on our behalf.

item.title: Getting AI To Confess Has Vital Uses Such As When LLMs Generate Ruinous Mental Health Advice

item.title: Holly Holm Vs. Stephanie Han Fight Card, Date, Time And How To Watch
item.description: Holly Holm challenges Stephanie Han for the WBA lightweight title on Jan. 3 in Puerto Rico. Here's when the co-main starts and how to watch on DAZN.

item.title: AI chip designer Biren’s shares surge 76% on debut in Hong Kong
item.description: Biren’s strong start will likely augur well for two other AI-related stocks—MiniMax and Zhipu—that are set to list in HK next week.

item.title: Americans surge toward financial resolutions for 2026 amid household budget concerns

item.title: Mortgage rates hit 2025 low as homebuyers catch a break
item.description: Mortgage rates drop to their lowest point in 2025, offering potential relief for homebuyers in today's competitive housing market across the nation.

item.title: I’m 35 and the only house I can afford is a mobile home. Is it a bad idea?

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
